Articles.Content: Hi, I was just wondering if there's a mod with the old mk3 parts. I tried looking it up but no results come up. There is also I remember, a cockpit mod for it which looks amazing. So uh yeah, any where where I could get the old things?
I'm not aware of any but it wouldn't be hard to do, assuming all the colliders still work from a old version.
Anybody with an archive could probably share the part file with ya. Might need new shaders, and a once-over on the cfg..
Kerbal Historical Institute. Has all old parts dating all the way back to 0.7.3.
